1684540.name: Eye of the Temple Original Soundtrack
1684540.description:
Journey into a Vast and Treacherous Temple

The Official Soundtrack for Eye of the Temple captures the atmosphere of the vast temple complex of the game.


In addition to standard MP3 files, lossless FLAC files are included as well if you have enabled downloading high-quality audio files in the Steam 'Music' settings.


The Eye of the Temple Original Soundtrack is composed by Claudi Martinez.
